 ; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Tabs, Tab, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown, NavItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import Typography from "@mui/material/Typography"; import Box from "@mui/material/Box"; import PersonOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/PersonOutlined"; import CalendarTodayOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CalendarTodayOutlined"; import HelpOutlineOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/HelpOutline"; const themeColors = { primary: "#E1242A", secondary: "#891515", darkGrey: "#34373F", lightGrey: "#A1A4AC", black: "#000000", white: "#FFFFFF", background: "#EDF2F4", }; const Topbar = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(); const Item = ({ title, to, icon }) => ( setSelected(title)} className={selected === title ? "active" : ""} style={{ display: "flex", alignItems: "center", textDecoration: "none", color: "inherit", }} > {icon} {title} ); return ( My Brand
Pages } /> } /> } />
); }; export default Topbar;
